metadata.metaValue: Apply random color per clump ID, set render settings and draw in the viewport.
Generate hair strands and guide strands on the geometry.

This clumps the hair onto the guides. For each hair root, we find the closest guide root and store the found indices.
We then interpolate the hair point positions onto its respective guide's point positions.
The clumping weight is controlled with the time value.
Clumps generated hair strands onto generated guide strands. This also shows how to draw random color per clump ID.
